text:
From: Lasha Khanishvili <l.khanishvili@allianz-energy.eu> 
Sent: Monday, January 22, 2024 1:55 PM
To: Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com>
Cc: Backoffice Team <luka.p@allianz-energy.eu>; Boriana Ganovska - Universconsult <b_ganovska@universconsult.com>; AccountingDepartment2 UNIVERSCONSULT <accountingdepartment2@universconsult.com>
Subject: Re: FW: Unpaid invoice

 

Dear partners

The invoice has been paid, We apologize for the delay and thank you for your understanding

Kind regards

 

 

 

On Mon, Jan 22, 2024 at 3:41 PM Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com <mailto:a.ivanova@tibiel.com> > wrote:

	Здравейте,

	Приложено изпращаме фактура за сделка на Газов хъб Балкан, която все още не сте платили. Моля да заплатите фактурата възможно най-скоро.

	В случай, че сте извършили плащане моля да ни изпратите платежен документ.

	 

	Поздрави!

	ЕКИПА НА ТИБИЕЛ

	 

	Hello,

	Attached is an invoice for a Gas Hub Balkan transaction that you have not yet paid. Please pay the invoice as soon as possible.

	In case you have made a payment, please send us a payment document.

	 

	Greetings!

	TIBIEL'S TEAM




 

-- 

Lasha Khanishvili

Managing Director

ALLIANZ ENERGY BULGARIA LLC

ID 205890287

Bulgaria, Sofia 1172, Tintyava Street 124

Mob: +359 876138000
